subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Demonstrations, Protests, and Riots
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Bogdana Matsotska, an Alpine skier, and her father and coach, Oleg Matsotskyy, say they are leaving Sochi to show solidarity with protesters in the capital city of Kiev.
snippet: Bogdana Matsotska, an Alpine skier, and her father and coach, Oleg Matsotskyy, say they are leaving Sochi to show solidarity with protesters in the capital city of Kiev.
